DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety reactogenicity booster dose GSK Biologicals ' dTpa vaccine ( Boostrix ) Chinese child 6-8 year age .
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Safety & Reactogenicity GSK Biologicals ' dTpa Vaccine ( Boostrix ) When Given 6-8 Years Age .
